*Drazom see's the shots coming and pushes Mantella out of the way and gets
hit by both of the shots* Drazom: Grrr... *Drazom jumps into the air and
starts flying with his wings that he also has in robot mode and pulls his
gun out and starts shooting fire bombs at Double Punch, Manterror and
Injector and Mantella started shooting eye lasers at them* Mantella:
Quickstrike! Send help out here! *Mantella said into her commlink*-----
Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 11:38 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Mantella, please post damage)
>
> Hades/Anubis/Koga Shuko/Nemesis Enforcer/Scavenger/Breakdown/Hiss/Double
> Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Punch (Counter Punch)/Dark
> One/Pyro/Scattershot:
>
> ::Hades and Anubis opened fire on Inferno, several plasma and laser bolts
> heading for the fire ants chest (if he's still at the battle, if he's not,
> post otherwise please)::
>
> ::Koga Shuko slammed his fist into a wall::
> "Fool!  Blunderer!"
> <Unitron, Unitron, UNITRON!  GET UP!  Report to the bridge immediately!>
>
> -----
>
> ::Unitron slowly got up, opening fire with a few shots at Rampage, heading
> for the bridge quickly::
>
> ==========
>
> ::A small craft, of a Human design, flew through space, sheilds up and
> weapons ready::
> ::The pilot, who was the only passenger, layed on his recharge bed,
awaiting
> for his ship's sensors to awake him when his flight was finished::
> ::Suddenly, almost out of no where, the ship started jolting, a tearing
sound
> awakening the pilot::
> "What the slag!" he got up, slowly, a whole ripping through his ship, a
piece
> of metal shaped like a spike nearly hitting him, going through the other
side
> of his ship.  He ran to the cockpit, looking out of the view screen.
> "Debris...but from what!" he checked the scanners.
> "A mix between rock and ship debris..typical for my-ARGH!" he screamed as
he
> slammed headfirst into the view screen, the ship rapidly descending
towards
> Earth, entering it's gravitational pull::
>
> ============
>
>
> ::Double Punch sighed, firing off two missiles at Drozom::
>
> ::Manterror fired an ion disk at Drozom, then fired one off at Mantella::
>
> ::Injector laughed evily, firing off two stinger missiles at Mantella::
> "Die, die, die, DIE!"
>
> =============
> (Profiles for Bumblebee, Punch (Counter Punch), and Scattershot  will be
> given later)
> ::A black stasis pod that had lingered in space from Koga Shuko and Set's
> craft (smashed out of the ship) was caught by Earth's gravitational pull,
the
> stasis pod descending rapidly as it was tugged down by an invisible
force::
>
> ::Colliding into the ground, a cloud of dirt rose into the sky::
> ::A scanner slid up from a panel in the stasis pod, scanning the area for
a
> life form::
> Computer: -Lifeform found, beast mode selected-
> ::The 'hatch' opened, a loud buzzing sound eminating from the pod, a 5 ft
> long, 4 ft high bumblebee coming out of the pod::
> "Bumblebee, transform!"
> ::Bumblebee, yellow and black, transformed to his robot mode, a stinger
> missile launcher in both hands::"How'd I get here?  This has to be
> Earth...but...slag!  Set and that Shuko idiot must'a slagged everything
up!
> I payed that good energon to be smuggled to Nebulos under the Humablos
> Authorities' noses!  Stupid corporation owners!"
> ::He slammed his fist into a tree, heading off at a fast pace::
>
> ===================
>
> ::Nemesis Enforcer stretched his neck, looking to DeathStorm::
> "We are to attempt and convert three enemy units to our cause.  Zardus'
> orders are, if we can't, you are to assassinate them." he lied,
transforming
> to his giant bat mode, flapping his wings, he flew outside, slapping Dark
One
> across the face with a wing, catching a thermal and slowly heading for the
> coordinates, yelling to DeathStorm to follow him::
>
> ==========
>
> ::Another stasis pod from Koga Shuko and Set's craft plummeted into the
> Earth, the scanner popping up and finding a sutibable animal (sorry for
the
> lame post, a little lax for time and have to cut down on this because it
> might become to long)::
> ::Out of the pod came a bald eagle, the scavenger animal lifting off into
the
> air, flowing with the wind::
>
> ==========
>
> ::Dark One fired off a loser bolt at Nemesis Enforcer after he had hit him
> (Dark One had been hit), missing, grabbing Pyro and going into the
Alliance
> base, the shileds coming up immediately after he entered::
> ::Getting to a CR chamber, Dark One placed Pyro in a CR chamber,
activating
> it, then he got in a CR chamber, automatically activating::
>
> ==========
>
> ::Breakdown leaned against the craft that had brought Injector, Double
Punch,
> and Manterror (as well as Stinkbomb) to the planet, yelling::
> "Hiss, you done yet?!"
>
> "Engines are almost online!  Scavenger is working on the data logs, trying
to
> get more information!"
>
> "I can speak for myself!" Scavenger yelled, muttering a few ancient
> Cybertronian swear words::
>
>
>
